name: Rule of Three
description:
Witches live by the Rule of Three...

Rule of Three is a light-hearted puzzle-platformer about a young witch searching for a forbidden power. Play as Astrid, an eager apprentice witch ready to take her trial and claim the power her clan has been studying for years. Use telekinesis, push blocks, astral project, and even split your soul to solve puzzles and platforming challenges.

Controls:

WASD - Move

J - Use Magic on Enchanted Objects

I - Astral Project

K - Switch Active Player (during soul split)

Space - Zoom Out

P - Pause
